ygData.subject: Re: Playing Where's Waldo in Shar Vahl
ygData.msgSnippet: The weapon and tunic given to you by your trainer at creation should eqip. They were made especially for your character. I can t imagine why your club wouldnt
ygData.messageBody:
The weapon and tunic given to you by your trainer at creation should
eqip. They were made especially for your character. I can't imagine
why your club wouldnt work if it is the one given at start up. You do
not need hand-to-hand to use club. That is for exactly what it says-
hand to hand combat. :)

Laurylle Soulsdesire
35th Cleric of Tunare
<Faveo Sulum Ipsemet Ascio>
Morell-Thule


--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "John D Pennington, III
<edward001@c...>" <edward001@c...> wrote:
> --- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "Claude P Perry II"
> <crhydderch@a...> wrote:
> > You should have been given a newbie weapon that you can use when
> you first
> > created your char. also if you go to the guy you turned in your
> tattered
> > note thingy to you should also be able to at least put 1 of
those
> training
> > points in hand 2 hand
> >
> >
> Training points? That implies training which I didn't get. I'll
back
> track and see what I missed. My newbe weapon is a club. I haven't
> been able to use it because it won't equip. Maybe that's because I
> need hand-to-hand training to use it. I'll check that out. Thanks.
>
> Edward
